skills.skill: Analog and High Speed Digital Design
Low Voltage Power Regulation and Delivery

duties_responsibilities.duty: Create design decisions, often difficult ones, that will benefit millions of iPhone users worldwide.
Lead designs that continually push the boundaries of technology and ultimately improve the iPhone user experience.
Design and integration of custom hardware into constrained systems.
Work daily with multi-functional technology teams in a fast-paced environment.
